name: David Ramirez
text: Oh, that means you have to aim for 20s!    Yeah, the math's not hard. I'm just curious if someone's put it up for download, or better, made a simple calculator tool for optimizing a deck. Not that I play except for when you guys come by, and not well at all, but it seems like one of those things that everyone who does a constructed could be doing.     Actually, would you be allowed to have a calculator type app with you to optimize with during a draft tourney?
